task.title: Enable Reporting
task.shortdesc: Eucalyptus installs with reporting functionality. However, this functionality is not enabled by default. To enable reporting functionality, perform the steps listed in this topic.

step.cmd: Use the euca-describe-properties command to set up polling intervals. Polling intervals are in minutes.

info.p: By default, the polling interval is set to 0, which means that reporting is disabled.

step.cmd: Use the euca-describe-properties command to set up write intervals. This interval, in minutes, determines how often you want Eucalyptus to write what it has collected in its polling intervals.
